website_summaries.verdict: A luxurious-feeling satin pajama that is high quality, but that tends to run small.
pros: Done in a soft and silky satin, this pajama is praised for feeling more high-end than it appears for the cost
It also stands out for fitting most women well and pays special attention to details like the covered buttons
cons: Certain colors, such as red, tend to fade, and a few felt the sizing ran small, especially in the fit of the waist
Some stomach sleepers were bothered by the buttons

customer_reviews.title: Mmm...mmm...mmmmm! These are some nice jammies!
customer_reviews.text: Ooooohhh....guuurrllll! Lemme tell you bout these jammies right here! I ordered them on a Wednesday, and Bam! What do you know? They was here by Friday! Just in time to slip in and watch some marriage boot camp (sold separately on Amazon video😉) Mmmmmhmmm... They silky, shinny, and oh so soft on my skin. I feel like Kim Kardashian in these... Kanye better look on out now! I ordered the grey in small, as you can see, they got me so excited, I was tucked in by 4pm. They definitely worth the purchase. Get you some silkies gurl!
customer_reviews.author: Jack-Attack

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality stains everything
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It’s so soft and comfortable and I was actually living in it on weekends. I was very fond of it until the day I realized it stains everything and anything it’s in touch with. My skin, my bed, my robe, pillows... everything is now in black dye. Very disappointing. I still love it and wear it I wish it was a better quality. I def stopped wearing after I changed my sheets. This is just a joke. I have to trash my bedding and everything that has been stained. Who will refund me for everything this stupid pj has ruined ?
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 😊
customer_reviews.text: honestly these are so freakin comfy, they fit perfectly, theyre pretty and i was surprised to open it up and see a handwritten note thanking me for my business . super cute ❤
customer_reviews.author: mayly

customer_reviews.title: The description is accurate in the size chart!
customer_reviews.text: I liked these--they were too short for my six foot frame, but fit my body otherwise. I wear an American size 6-8, and the medium size fit comfortably,just the pants were too short, but I'm unusually tall , so this would be a fine length for most women. I got the gray, which is a pretty silver gray color. Nice weight to the fabric. There are satin pajamas, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry matonis

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This is my second one. But don't buy a RED one! The red color bleeds like crazy. I've washed it at least10 times and it still rubs off and stains my white sheets. Thus, the 4 stars. The blue set gets 5 STARS! This blue one is perfect. It is amazingly soft, comfy, and feels luxurious. It is very well made with lovely details...piping and covered buttons! It was a very very slow delivery, but worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Prissy14

customer_reviews.title: Uber silky poly/satin.  Size up.
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the silkiness of these poly/satin PJ's. They truly rival my really expensive ones. I have learned to always size up when it comes to 100% silk or poly/satin PJ's and these are no exception. Even so, the bottoms are snuger than I'd like, but the top fits perfectly. The length is perfect, hits the top of my foot (I'm 5'10.5"). I've ordered green, royal blue, and light blue and haven't had any color bleeding or staining issues. Shipping can be unpredictable. The first pair I purchased months ago took 3 weeks to deliver. I ordered 2 pairs last week and they came in 2 days. I've just ordered my fourth pair (red).
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn  Louise Berman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love this pajamas, they look just like the picture, i am a 5.1 petite girl i weigh 128 pounds I ordered size small I did not have alter anything, they very luxurious, I o happy I decided to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: It's soft, the color is GORGEOUS! It's a little loose and all but I think it's comfortable for sleeping. I'm 5'1" and 110lb and go the XS if that helps. Highly recommend for ladies on the shorter side, I always have trouble with pant length, this one was a little long but I thought it was perfect bc it wasn't long enough for it to drag or anything. The cut of the top and the bottom are very flattering, it doesn't swallow petit people and it's also not tight in strange areas so I think it would be perfect for different body and bust sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Melon

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but purple color does bleed — even under arms
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5” 200 lbs & purchased size 2XL. I have these in purple, gray-silver (more of a taupe color), & emerald green. Pajamas are a bit too long so I’ll need to hem. Otherwise, they fit well and are very soft and comfortable to wear and to sleep in. Would not buy the purple again because of bleeding. They bled in the wash, purple color transferred onto the inside of my robe and also under my arms! : ( The taupe and green seem to be colorfast. No bleeding or color transfer. Nice pocket on the pj tops, which is handy. Recommend & Wd buy again. Wd just stay away from purple, red and perhaps any deep shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The dyes run very badly even after washing!
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and soft. I first ordered a grey and a pink set. Loved them so much that I bought black and red. My only complaint, but it's a biggie, the darker colors have stained my white sheets! The colors run! Even after multiple washes. I've tried vinegar. I've tried soaking. I've tried hot water. It makes me worry if my skin is absorbing these dyes as I sleep! I'm throwing out the black and red ones. I don't trust them. The grey and pink seem to hold their color.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Wolf

customer_reviews.title: lovely material, poor fit
customer_reviews.text: The material is gorgeous and has been holding up well. Unfortunately the sleeves and pants are pretty short. I am 5'7" and everything fits fine through the shoulders and around the waist, this pajama set was just designed for someone a lot shorter. Also, the pants are put together strangely, there is a lot of extra material in the front of the pants so it kind of balloons out in a weird sort of way. Still, a comfortable set, affordable, nice material. I won't be getting more from this company however.
customer_reviews.author: d c

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really love these pajamas since they are super soft and fit me well. I bought a large since I am 5’4 and 155 lbs. I Have only worn them one time since I bought them for a pajama party where we were requested to wear all black satin pajamas. Most of the girls bought theirs for $10 more from another brand on Amazon. Since I found these at a lower price, I thought they may look different than the others, however, they really didn’t so I was very pleased with this buy! Granted I have not washed them yet so I cannot comment on how they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Christi C

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: First off, it's satin, not silk, so I'm not sure why the product title says "silk satin" because it's 100% polyester. However, I was pleasantly surprised by the quality for the price. The buttons are covered, and the fabric is fairly sturdy. I'm 5'3" so the pants are a little long, but fine if I wear them just above my natural waist. The sleeves are perfect, so overall pretty happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE these pajamas!!! I have 2 sets!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOOOOVE these pajamas!! I got a pair of these in a different color (they are taupe?) as a Christmas present. Loved them so much that I purchased the same ones in blue! Got them yesterday and immediately washed and wore them the same night! Oh my goodness! So pretty, so soft, and fits me PERFECTLY! I'm 5ft 2" and 125 lbs. It's very difficult to find anything that is short enough for my arms and legs. These couldn't fit any better!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Kost

customer_reviews.title: Best pajamas ever and I mean it
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have bought on Amazon. Super comfortable. Excellent quality. Feels incredible and had me sleeping like a baby... a baby with very good taste in pajamas. I like the gray color. It was tough to decide which size. Didn’t want the sleeves to be too short so I went with a medium (5’5 and 140 lbs) but the pants are long for me. Totally keeping them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Pcookie

customer_reviews.title: I sleep better
customer_reviews.text: These satin pajamas are exactly what I was hoping for. I wear a 2XL, hard to find a good fit. These are great. They're so sleek that in them I feel like I'm down to an L. The hem is long, meeting my fingertips, all the more favorable to my shape. Best of all, because of the slippery nature of the satin, I can roll over in bed more easily than in my flannel pj's, thus a better night's sleep. I've washed them several times and they've held up superbly, no fraying of the folded over seams of loss of elasticity. I am very pleased and will definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Feels wonderful on the skin. They are so comfortable that I have to force myself to take them off. Sizing is what you would expect. Got an extra large because I wanted them loose fitting but should have gotten a large. Large would have been plenty loose. They are very long just like I like them. Would highly recommend. As soon as the green pair is back in stock will order. Currently have the purple pair. Nice rich color.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable elastic waist
customer_reviews.text: These have a nice feel to them but, it has a skinny elastic waist with a drawstring that was uncomfortable. Instead of the silky feeling being, the elastic waist took away the "feel good" feeling. It is more of an elastic that you would find in women's underwear. If the elastic was a wider band, the pants would sit comfortably on the waist. Also, after a few good toss & turns, the buttons would come off. They need a flat medium size button to work. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Priestley

customer_reviews.title: So smooth and silky!
customer_reviews.text: DOES IT SPARK JOY? yasss. Yass it does. I can’t comment on having worn these for a long time because it’s only been minutes since I opened the package and worn them, but these are so silky and comfortable. customer_reviews.author: tfox

I provided everyone with the size guide and I noticed that several people did size up for length. The company answered questions promptly and professionally. I plan to use them again in the future. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. Popaditch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.author: glenarbourgal

customer_reviews.title: BEST AND MOST COMFY PJ'S

customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!

customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.author: DLY0504

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, well made - would give a TEN if possible!!

customer_reviews.author: Mountainlady

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love PJs, and in the winter I love NOT having to struggle to turn over because PJs stick to my cotton sheets some. I agree that these are slightly undersized -- I should swim in a 3X size, but these are comfortably loose. The elastic waist is not too snug or loose, and the draw string adds more control over the fit if you need that.
customer_reviews.author: Linda ScottTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Silky and luxurious

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but too long for petite women
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these were too long for me. I’m 5’2” and I would need to hem up at least 4 inches. Also, I have 46” hips and 36” waist, ordered the XL (per the size chart) and although they fit snuggly, I would want the 2XL because they were too tight in the hips and thighs for sleeping. The top fit really nicely. These are really nice satin pajamas, the quality is nice, the white piping is pretty, I just wish they were not so long. If you are bigger on the bottom than the top, definitely order up one size to fit your hips. If you are shorter, plan on hemming them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom65

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pajamas, great style, fabric (not silk but machine washable), fit and quality, well made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pajamas, true to size, well made, the grey color is a beautiful taupe grey platinum. hand washed the black ones and they did not run at all (hanged them to dry, they did not even need ironing) Silk satin is not silk, but it looks and feel just like it and can be machine washed which is a plus. My wife loves them she has 3 pair for Christmas , she says to hand-wash so they will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pj’s ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Had tow order three pairs. Softest beast quality satin pjs I’ve ever found. Better then Victoria secrets by far. I’ve wasted multiple time and they still look brand new and feel so soft. The buttons are even covered in fabric adding a very fancy feel. Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to feel like their fanciest self when going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: A SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Silky PJ's
customer_reviews.text: Price point for the quality is great but I had to return from a 2X to a 3X! I don't wear a 3X in anything!! The 3X top is fuller than I would like but not sloppy plus the sleeves are long enough and the pants are no so snug in the crotch. The colors are very jewel tone and would make a nice gift for Christmas or any occasion. Just be mindful if you have longer arms and carry your weight in your hips you may need to size up but they have FREE RETURNS so it's all good!
customer_reviews.author: Charly

customer_reviews.title: perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Im a male, but ordered anyways. Im 6'1" 190 lbs. Avg build. Got the xxl. Fits perfectly. Looks masculine, and is very comfortable and soft. Why should only women feel this cozy when sleeping. It does have a chemical smell when i opened the package. Wash on gentle cold water. No more smell. I highly recomend this product if you like having your body wrapped in soft silky smoothness while you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: jack of trades

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with these PJs
customer_reviews.text: I love the silky material more than worth the money compared to Victoria Secret pajamas which not near as silky feeling. I love the color. It is very comfy to sleep in. I have washed it and had not issues afterward. I am 5'3 140lbs 36DD and ordered a large because I didnt want it tight fiting. It is a little long in the sleeves and pants but otherwise I love the fit. I will be buying other colors. Better than described in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Pamh

customer_reviews.title: A definite have
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love these pajamas! I am 4’11” so I purchased them without alteration. They are very classy and comfortable. I purchased the wine color washed them and they still look brand new. I went back and purchased the grey as well. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to feel and look good!
customer_reviews.author: Professor A. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Expensive feel, affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So comfy. They feel silky and good quality without making me too warm. They are a little long for me so I wear them more high waist but it is still totally comfortable. I probably could have sized down but a small still totally works. 5’2” 125 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but iffy stitching
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and silky. It definitely feels nice to slip into these comfy pajamas after a long day or just lounge in them on a lazy day. They have a loose fit which I expected but it fits well without falling. My only complaint is the quality of the stitching. They have been washed once and there is already a tear in the seam. Fortunately it is by the armpit so it’s not noticeable but still kind of bummed about the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Chmelecki

customer_reviews.title: Just gorgeous, but runs short in length,
customer_reviews.text: The fabric and style is gorgeous. Looks and feels far more expensive, including French-seamed-construction, but the arms and legs are short. I originally ordered a small, I'm a misses size 4/6 but I had to exchange for a medium because the arms and legs were too short. I'm only 5'5" but even the medium arms are about 2" too short on me. I do love them and plan on purchasing a black pair, but in large!
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful pajamas in the world!
customer_reviews.text: To be perfectly honest, I saw Smurf on "Animal Kingdom" in a pair of royal blue pajamas, so I had to search and here they are. They are the exact match & I have to say, the best, silkiest pajamas I have ever owned. You will not be disappointed in these!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Smooth until one wash
customer_reviews.text: These were everything I expected when I first got them. I did not see any washing instructions so I washed them on warm and gentle cycle. I put them in the dryer on low heat along with three or four tee shirts. When I took them out I noticed snags EVERYWHERE! I’m afraid to ever wash them again! I’m super disappointed. I was really excited about these pjs. 😢
customer_reviews.author: shari

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the color green....they sent blue. I ordered small...but it is too small, sleeves run a little short. And when you wash them it must be in cold water because it is not acutely silk, but silk-like. AND, you have to "dry them in the sun"....I haven't seen the sun where I live for a week. They do feel nice on the skin with the silk-like material. I didn't send them back because it takes more time and trouble to do that than just donate them to a charity or give to a small niece.
customer_reviews.author: Wolflady5

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!!!

Of course, since purple is my favorite color, I ordered the purple set. And it is absolutely gorgeous. Once you put it on, you're not going to want to take it off. I will be getting another one for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Coletta Weathered

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have enough good words to say about this!! I bought them to wear as separate real clothes and when I told people they were cheap pajamas from amazon everyone was shocked. They’re incredibly comfy and look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly soft pjs that hold up well to washer and low setting dryer. You can tell they are some magical man-made material because they do tend to trap heat/sweat. Really pretty set though.
customer_reviews.author: Walden Revisited

customer_reviews.title: Satin gorgeous shiny soft perfection
customer_reviews.text: These satin pajamas are the most beautiful soft silky comfortable things you'll ever wear order true to size I got the gray and it's just beautiful I got an XL because I thought they were going to run small I'm going to get them tailored just the bottoms I like the top super large but rather than send those beautiful pajamas back I'm spending $8 to get the bottom made a little smaller you will love them order true to size
customer_reviews.author: Carol Longley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, classic look. Very well-made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a larger size, and they were true to size. I wanted them baggie, and they were. The material is very nice, they wash very well. I love them. Super comfy and very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected - would buy another set
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality - not real silk, but based on the price that is evident. But, knowing that going in I’m impressed by the softness and I prefer this to some of my real silk pajamas as this is a bit thicker. Regarding size I’m 5’6” 118 pounds and saw the other reviews regarding the length, therefore a bought a medium. It is a bit baggy in the legs however the extra room is comfortable. I always wash anything I purchase before wearing in general - I saw others complain about color transfer on sheets, but this was avoided by washing the garment. The navy blue color is luxurious - high recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaNYC

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ These, I need more
customer_reviews.text: I love these pj's and am feeling myself. The color green is vibrant and chic just like I hoped. The fit is good and the quality of fabric is fantastic. I am ordering another in navy for myself and a bunch of other colors for Christmas gifts. Buys these pjs, u won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini83

customer_reviews.title: I really like these pajamas

It makes me a little nervous about how these will hold up. But I can sew it back down myself for now.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Rosengren

customer_reviews.title: The fit and feel was great! I feel like a million bucks when I ...

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the size is perfect. I usually wear an xsmall but the small ...

I highly recommend you to buy this Pajamas Set for your daughter, wife, sister or mother; she would really feel relaxed and comfortable, no matter what they’re doing at home.

Great buy!

The only thing I would suggest is to get a smaller size than what you wear. I kept the two mediums for the hospital but bought my third pair a small. These are beautiful to lounge around the house.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pj's for warmer weather

I'm usually cold, so these probably weren't a good choice for me; the fabric is very nice, but I'll have to wait until spring to break them in.
